it's the world's smallest sovereign
state by both size and population just
1/8 is big as Central Park and home to
just 900 citizens these are the enclosed
walls to the country the Vatican is
known for having some of the world's

Basilica and Michelangelo's work in the

himself lives and gives speeches often
to the public so it appears as if the
Pope is going to give a speech soon then
the balcony right there the Vatican
really does function as an independent
country they issue their own euro coin
their own passports license plates and
they even have their own post office
flag telephone system and radio station
the museum's of the Vatican receive over

really long and it's really

and the best part actually this whole

all Vatican is a great place it's very
